sentences.english: Take some time to say a prayer and “have a talk with God”.
sentences.chinese: 花一些時間來禱告，並且適時地與上帝嘮嘮嗑。

sentences.english: Do you often speak English with foreigners?
sentences.chinese: 你經常和老外用英語嘮嗑嗎？

sentences.english: Do you often talk with foreigners on internet?
sentences.chinese: 你經常在網上和老外嘮嗑嗎？
